about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate Flutter developer with a proven track record of creating exceptional mobile experiences

story.title: My Journey
story.paragraph1: With over 5 years of experience in mobile development, I've dedicated my career to crafting beautiful, performant applications that users love. My journey began with native Android development, but I found my passion in Flutter's cross-platform capabilities.
story.paragraph2: Today, I specialize in creating scalable, maintainable mobile applications that solve real-world problems. I believe in writing clean code, following best practices, and staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends.

items.name: Mohamed Adrees
items.content: Louay delivered an exceptional Flutter app that exceeded our expectations. His attention to detail and technical expertise made our project a huge success.

items.name: Mobarak
items.content: Working with Louay was a pleasure. He understood our requirements perfectly and delivered a high-quality app on time and within budget.

items.name: Mohamed Ali
items.content: Louay's Flutter expertise helped us launch our app successfully across both iOS and Android. The code quality is outstanding and the app performs flawlessly.

noot.title: Noot
noot.description: Discover the best real estate rental options across Saudi Arabia with Noot ‚Äî your ultimate solution for renting apartments, villas, offices, and commercial spaces. Whether you're seeking housing or commercial property, the app offers precise filters for location, price, and amenities to help you find the perfect match. It delivers a transparent, secure user experience with direct communication between renters and property owners, detailed listings, and clear images. Enjoy innovative rental solutions combining comfort, technology, and trust.

nootOwner.title: Noot Owner
nootOwner.description: Noot Owner is your trusted partner in the property rental journey, offering a seamless, transparent, and secure experience. Discover a comprehensive marketplace tailored to tenants and business users across Saudi Arabia‚Äîsearch apartments, villas, offices, and commercial spaces with precision using powerful filters like price range, location, and amenities. Our app empowers you with clear property details and high‚Äëquality images, helping you make informed decisions quickly and confidently. Directly communicate with landlords and complete rental transactions through our built‚Äëin messaging system, all while ensuring safe, encrypted data exchange. Whether you're searching for a long‚Äëterm residence or a commercial lease, Noot Owner combines innovation with simplicity to streamline your rental experience from start to finish.

breeze.title: Breeze - ÿ®ÿ±Ÿäÿ≤
breeze.description: Your car wash app, ‚ÄúBazaar‚Äù, provides a comprehensive experience for users to obtain car wash services with ease and ease. The application includes various service packages in addition to individual laundry options, with advanced features such as chat for direct communication and the use of coupons to obtain exclusive discounts. It allows users to easily manage orders, delivery addresses, and payment methods, while providing additional services such as advertising management and interest management to achieve an integrated user experience in both Arabic and English.

breezeAdmin.title: Breeze Admin
breezeAdmin.description: The delegate application is the tool intended for car wash service providers, as it allows representatives to receive new orders, view accurate customer and location details, and communicate instantly with customers through the built-in chat feature. The representative can easily update the order status (in progress, completed...) providing a flexible and organized working experience. The application is designed to support field service operations with high efficiency, and works in full integration with the customer application to ensure a seamless experience for both parties.

mazij.title: Mazij
mazij.description: Mazij is an application that includes the largest stores, whether they are regular shops, wholesale outlets, or factories. It simplifies the shopping process by offering a solution to the challenges of quickly and easily finding nearby stores with their ratings and prices.
